==== Installation: ====

1. Download Wikipedia on DVD iso: http://stats.4dev.net/pepper/tillkruess/downloads/download.php?uri=http%3A//stats.4dev.net/pepper/tillkruess/downloads/download.php%3Furi%3Dhttp%253A//www.4dev.net/%257Ewikidvd/kiwix-0.5.iso.bz2
2. Download Kiwix: "svn co https://kiwix.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/kiwix kiwix"
3. Follow instructions in ./kiwix/README

==== Packaging ====

Get into universe first, discuss with Edubuntu team.
